Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement)
While wearing these spider-silk slippers, you make no sound, regardless of the surface trod upon. You make Dexterity (Stealth) checks with advantage. Additionally, three uses of the following abilities, in any combination, can be made per long rest:

  • Ignore difficult terrain for up to a minute.
  • Cast one of the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ZrTc23tToJ0JpH2h]{jump}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj]{pass without trace}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.KJRVzeMQXPj8Gtyx]{spider climb}.
